Class EnergyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.examples.hem.equipments.manager.components.EnergyManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, EnergyManagerComponentAccessI, EnergyManagerImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.EmbeddingComponentAccessI

    public class EnergyManager
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
implements EnergyManagerImplementationI, EnergyManagerComponentAccessI
    The class EnergyManager implements an energy manager as a component.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2020-01-10

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
